example.text: WATCH? : This Administration should have done much more to prepare for the end of Title 42. That’s the simple truth. But the hyper-partisan HR 2 does nothing to make border states like mine safer. Worse, it sabotages our broken immigration system. We have to do better. [[url]]

This morning I met with [[user]] and a bipartisan group of lawmakers from the House and Senate to discuss efforts to crack down on fentanyl trafficking. Keeping this deadly drug out of our communities is going to take a coordinated, international response. [[url]]

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Law is working to improve drought resiliency in Arizona—like building a 19.4 mile pipeline to bring recycled water to [[user]], helping them leave more in Lake Mead. Today's groundbreaking ceremony was a great way to end #InfrastructureWeek! [[url]]

This morning I met with [[user]] and a bipartisan group of lawmakers from the House and Senate to discuss efforts to crack down on fentanyl trafficking. Keeping this deadly drug out of our communities is going to take a coordinated, international response. [[url]]

WATCH? : This Administration should have done much more to prepare for the end of Title 42. That’s the simple truth. But the hyper-partisan HR 2 does nothing to make border states like mine safer. Worse, it sabotages our broken immigration system. We have to do better. [[url]]
